tool_description: Provides current market prices for companies listed on the Zimbabwe Stock Exchange.
title: zExchange

api_list.name: /company-list/
api_list.description: List all the companies listed on the Zimbabwe Stock Exchange as well as their opening and closing prices and trade volume as per that day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zexchange.p.rapidapi.com/company-list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zexchange.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
